content.detailedDescription:
at 2am i went to let my dogs out, and saw/heard nothing unusual. i returned to my upstairs bedroom on the front side of our house, and resumed watching television. i had my bedside window opened approximately 6", though my shades covered the gap. 
 at 2:05 exactly, my (almost 15 year old) daughter and her friend were in a nearby bedroom talking. her bedroom faces the rear of our home. there are no shades or blinds on her windows. the girls remarked that there must be a storm coming, as there were flashes visible in the upper edges of the windows, and appeared to emanate from the clouds/fog over the house. they then realized that the flashes were stationary and occurred in fixed intervals. as the girls looked more closely out the window, they were looking upward. they noticed that a large dark shape was moving over our 2 story home toward our backyard (west to east). the dark shape then dipped downward as it moved over the crest of our home toward our backyard (eastward), and was visible below the cloud/fog level, approximately 30 feet off the ground. as it moved slowly away, it became clear that it was triangular in shape, and had 3 lights along the back, flashing blue, red and green in varying patterns. the object emitted a low, pulsing hum noise that was audible from the girl's window. there were no loud or airplane/jet noises, or i would have heard them with my window open. i can only surmise that between my tv and my husband's snoring, i was unable to hear the very low noise.
 behind our home is an open field that is used for farming. it is a large, open area with the nearest houses about 1/4 a mile away (guessing - not an absolute distance). there is an old barn within ~200 feet of our home that sits in the southwest corner of the open field. as the object moved away from our property, it reached the area of the barn and hovered briefly. it then slowly moved away toward the northeast, and suddenly disappeared. it appeared to the girls that the object was approximately the width of 2 houses in size.
 at 2:08am, near the far east edge of the field, 2 similar objects suddenly "winked on" and moved around one another for a brief period. they appeared to be the same types of objects as the one that moved over our home. just as suddenly as they appeared, they seemed to "wink off" and disappear.
at 2:10am, a new set of flashes were visible over the house, and they were similar in nature to the first set. as the girls watched, a much larger, and louder (humming) object moved over the crest of our home, following the same path that the first one did. this one appeared identical in every way, with the exception that it was so large that as it dipped over our home, the edges were not immediately visible. it had to move beyond the barn for the entire object to be seen. it was easily double or more the size of the first object. as it moved west to east, it slowed over the field, and then slowly seemed to rotate over a fixed area, and remained there for approximately 3-5 minutes. it was possible to see strobing lights on all 3 corners of the object, but the 3 lights in color were only visible on the ���back��� edge of the object. as the object sat in place, the 2 objects that had been sighted at 2:08 suddenly lit back up and began to move around, as if in response to the larger object close to our home. this continued for the last couple of minutes that the large object hovered. with no warning, all three objects just disappeared. it looked as though the smaller objects streaked away to the left and right of the large one, and that the large object lifted straight up, out of sight. the two girls described their thoughts and feelings as though they were transfixed and unable to really do anything but watch. they debated whether to wake either myself or my husband, but were concerned that they may not be believed, especially after time had passed and no more objects were visible. the one thing that they did notice was police sirens in the vicinity (i did hear those), and they wondered if they were in any way responding to the objects. 
 the open field is sort of unusual in that it is sort of "land-locked". it has very busy roads on 2 sides, and has houses and suburbs on all 4 sides. if you didn't live next to it, you would not be aware that it is even there. considering it's size, that is really unusual. 
 a very short distance from the field, near the south-eastern corner are at least 3 bar/club businesses and a bowling alley, all of which would have closed at ~2am. if anyone was leaving them (this was a friday pm/saturday am time period) they should have been within eyesight of  some or all of the objects. the only variable that i am uncertain of is the cloud cover/fog placement. even when the objects were above the cloud/fog line, the rhythmic strobing was visible. 
 i have repeatedly asked questions of my daughter in different ways to verify details (and to a lesser extent her friend - she had to leave), and the story has remained consistent. i believe her - and that was before i had a chance to read/learn about all the other sightings near our area. we are very interested in verification of the sightings, and if anyone else saw anything similar. please get back with us if you learn anything, or we can do more.

[please note - though we don't want it posted publicly, entering our address into google maps will show you the field in relation to our home. in the lower left corner of the field is the barn and a dark, teardrop-shaped pond.]
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3-4 "humming" triangular crafts nearly at ground level in middletown, ohio.

content.detailedDescription:
The object was viewed at c. 6.05 pm on by my wife and i.  we were walking our dog near the junction of folds lane and dalewood road in the beauchief district of sheffield, england, when we saw a bright, orange illuminated object pass overhead. it appeared to be silent, and was travelling below the cloud base on a south south west to north north east heading.  it wasn't possible to estimate speed but it appeared to be moving quickly at a uniform rate. it left no con-trail that we could see, although it was dark. the object passed out of our line of sight behind trees.

weather conditions: cold (c. -2 degrees centigrade), clear, relatively low wispy clouds.

there was nothing specific that attracted our attention to the sky, we both seemed to notice the object at the same time.  we didn't know what the object was, but in the way that it moved it didn't resemble a fixed or rotary wing aircraft.  we simply observed it until it passed out of sight.

my reason for reporting this sighting is that this is the second time we have observed an object fitting this description in recent weeks.  the first sighting took place mid-afternoon on christmas day in the same area of sheffield as my wife and i returned home after walking the dog. on this occasion we were walking on dalewood road, roughly east to west.  the object appeared bright against the grey sky to the north west.  it appeared to move slowly southward, rising slightly as it did so. it then appeared to move slowly back and forth. at this point it passed out of sight behind trees as we walked, but in the seconds that it took to regain a clear line of sight, it had disappeared completely.

weather conditions at the time were grey and overcast.
content.summary: silent, illuminated orange object passed overhead travelling south south west to north north east.

content.detailedDescription: Was outside saw bright light descend to the ground. no sound or flash of light. event occurred in the ne. i spotted the object while under my awning at about 45��� above the horizon. was yellow in color.
content.summary: Saw same as pitman sighting.

content.detailedDescription:
I always lay on the bed petting my cats while i look out the window.  in fact, it is always at the same time....Right around 6:40am during my work week. ,the view is phenomenal as i can see a wide area of the naugatuck valley and beyond.  the morning light was just starting to appear from the west but to the east there was still a hint of darkness.  no direct sunlight over the horizon yet. 

 i am always searching the skies for planes etc and my eye caught sight of a white light coming from the sw, heading se. i kept my eye on it knowing that it is very unusual to see a plane at that time.
 
i got my binoculars to get a closer look.  it appeared to be a solid white light, quite bright, in fact.  i saw absolutely no red lights, no blinking lights, just a solid white light.  i am not very good at estimating distance from the ground.  this is what i know however.  i watch a lot of planes flying.  my house is located under the landing pattern where jets are flying into bdl so they are flying lower than 35,000 feet and i am used to seeing them at that height.  so i am amateurishly estimating that this object flew between 10,000-20,000 feet.

i tracked the object until it came close to the west and i lost it completely in the morning light.  
speed of object.....It wasn't flying fast like a jet.... slower.

i can only describe what i saw.....But it wasn't a plane.....It couldn't have been a satellite as it was low on the horizon and usually satellites are pinhead small in the sky.  this object was a big, glowing white light.

thank you.
content.summary: White light flying across early morning sky.

content.detailedDescription: On december 31st, 2009, 8:10pm i was walking in our neighborhood with my son watching sparatic fireworks. north view, east to west i noticed 10-15 lights orange in color. the lights did not blink, move fast or any type of action. there was two groups the first group had about 15-20 lights. i first thought of parachuters; there is a small airport not to far from us. however, i ruled that out when i noticed small craft flying in the same area. the small craft flying in our area is not unusual. the small air craft was closer than the lights to the ground, i noticed a few planes pass over the objects in the sky. another reason the lights caught my attention, the small craft were moving at a faster rate than the lights. the first group of lights had appeared and the front part of the group was a triangular formation, the front part of the formation started to fade after about five minutes. when the first group started to fade a second group appeared. the new group of lights were about 30-40 lights, traveling the same path and same speed. i had stopped just to observe and called my wife to get our camera to film north of our house. she was not quick enough. there was a neighbor in his yard outside and i pointed out the lights to him. he stood there with me and watched the lights. we noted the time at about 8:14pm for the second group. the lights traveled east to west and after 5 or 10 minutes faded. i have seen meteor showers before and this was not a meteor shower. there is a constant flow of small craft in our area and this was not small craft.***
content.summary: Multiple orange lights floating. appear instantly and faded away as they were moving.

content.detailedDescription: So i was outside having a smoke when i cought a bit of reflicted lite. like you might see off of an airplane. i watch the sky every day so i have become very good at picking out the real from not real. if you wanna look at it like that. plane or not plane. as i continued to focus on this tiny bit of light more and more began moving around one another like a flock of birds. some would break off and do a sharp movement in any direction then back to the group. they were headed directly overhead in a west by north west direction from aroura to denver.  then out of my line of sight. not like they vanished still in broad daylight just out of my view. i was extatic! i am still not positive on the total of craft i believe no less than 30 that i could group up but no more than 50. this was my first real life encounter with this style craft. however i had see hundreds in a report not to long ago from mexico. mexican military were folowing in jets hundreds of these smaller craft that moved in the same way.  i was the only one there at the time which sucks. however it was broad day light any i will never not believe what i saw. no photos.
content.summary: Multiple craft flying in formation at least 30 no more than 50 craft small like the ones in mexico.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my friends car, driving from the bronx river pkwy into tuckahoe through crestwood. we were had barely drove down columbus ave when we saw a big light hit the trees. my first thought was that she had turned her headlights on brighter, but then i saw what kind of light it was. my friend immediately said "i wonder who they're looking for", because we realized it was a search light. we slowed the car significantly and were going about 5mph as we were the only people on the road, to look up through the windshield expecting to see a police helicopter. 
instead what we saw was about 6 stories in the air, and looked like a thin wingless led zeppelin blimp, except completely vertical. it was low enough for me to notice that the metal wasn't smooth, but slightly evenly grooved, almost like an old juicer [something like this http://www.Csse.Monash.Edu.Au/~cema/courses/cse5910/lecturefiles/images/lect6b/juicer.Jpg]
both the bottom and top were rounded, and the shape did not vary, almost like a cigar. 
on the bottom of the object, there was a ring of steady blue light, and at the top a red blinking light. we both heard the noise it made, and it sounded almost like an air conditioner. a low constant drone, instead of the propellor sounds a hellicopter makes. 
as i was noticing what the object looked like, my friend (thinking it was a missile or bomb) was more concerned in the way it was flying. it came from over the houses on our left, and after hovering near us for a few seconds, started to come a bit lower to the ground, and then back up higher. she says it was flying someone erratic or haphazardly, and the object continued south in the same direction of the train tracks we were parallel to. we tried to follow the object by driving alongside the train tracks on columbus ave, down to main street in tuckahoe. however by the time we reached main st. (about 1.2 miles) we lost sight of the lights. the object was heading south. while driving from crestwood to tuckahoe, we were freaking out a bit after seeing it, and when we got to tuckahoe there were a few people on the street, and we had rolled down our windows to yell "did anyone else see that?" however no one seemed to have known what we were talking about. what really freaked us out about the object was that it was completely vertical the entire time, and we just knew that we had definitely never seen anything like it before.
content.summary: Cylindrical vertical object seen about 6 stories up, with search light, blue steady lights, & blinking red light.

content.detailedDescription: When i was 6 or 7' coming from a friends house in montague i was on the main road leading into montague going south to my home when i saw 3 dime sized objects flying overhead heading east.At the age i was i didn,t think anythink about it .To get to my home i crossed two wheat fields seperated by a line of trees.These fields are now all houses.At home i shared a bedroom with my two brothers.My oldest brother had his own bed. i shared one bed with my middle brother.When i went to bed i saw round like lights on my bedroom wall.It scared me that i started to cry and i ended up sleeping between my parents.Thats why i think i was 6 or 7 younger i won,t be out and older i would stay in my own bed.In my parents room i saw the lights again.I can,t remember any thing else about that night.Our driveway was dirt and in the morning when i went outside i thought someone broke a green bottle on the driveway in back of our house but it was small green stones.One odd thing that happened was when my dog and i were at a gravel pit a small one back in the woods behind our house about two miles in i think i got scared for some reason. my dog and i were exploring the gravel pit at the time i turned around and saw rounded mounds of dirt that wasn,t there before.The only way to discribe them is a show i saw on the discovery channel about giant ant hills they looked like that.I can,t remember  anything else about that day.At 17 i joined the navy stayed in for 10 years got married have two boys and have a normal life.Sometimes when going to work passing under a street light it will go out when i,am passed it the light will come back on thats my story thank you.P.S.I,am going to retire this june and one of the things on my list to do is go for a hypnosis to find out what happened in my childhood.
content.summary: I saw 3 dime sized in sky.

content.detailedDescription: At one o'clock this morning i went outside into my back yard to have a cigarette and let my 65 pound pit-bull go to the bathroom; i never smoke in my house.  it was dark outside and there were no lights on, in or outside of my house.  however the moon was rather full so i could somewhat see my surroundings.  i was staring up at the moon which was in the westward direction and my dog was at the fence also in the west side of the yard.  i was about half way through my cigarette when i had the feeling that someone was watching me from behind.  when i turned around i could see the outline of what appeared to be a person standing by the corner of my house near the fence and he/she seemed to be facing me.  immediately the figure started to run away from my house towards the back of the property (only about a 15 to 20 foot distance) when my dog heard its footsteps and ran towards it.  thinking that it was someone that shouldn't be in my yard i ran back into my house through the sliding glass door but left the door open so i could attempt to call my dog inside fearing for his safety.  as soon as my dog reached the figure, it flew straight up into the air at a height of approximately 10 feet and then flew directly to the far back edge of the property and either landed on the fence or hovered directly over it for about 2 minutes.  i could see the outline of what appeared to be either wings or some type of a cloak.  i love my dog very much but was too scared to let go of the door in fear that the figure would come towards me.  after a minute i realized that i could turn on the back yard light and did so. as i did i could barely see the figure as it went over the fence.  my dog continued to paw at the fence as i called for him to come inside.  after about a minute of calling him he came inside and i went directly upstairs to wake my girlfriend and tell her about what had just happened.  i am twenty nine years old and for many years i have believed in the possibility of extraterrestrials visiting earth.  i only say this because i have often thought about how i would react if i ever had an encounter. every time i thought about it, i imagined that although it may be a little scary, overall i would be thrilled.  i don't know if this figure was from this planet or not but either way, i assure you that i have never been more frightened in my life.  i don't know if what was in "my" yard was there for a reason or merely by coincidence, but i am sure that i will be smoking my cigarettes in the garage from now on.  unfortunately my dog will have to brave the night time bathroom breaks with me watching safely from my house, but he doesn't seem too scared.  i know that this is not the traditional type of ufo sighting, but i didn't know who else to contact.  i don't wish for any type of publicity what so ever, but would greatly appreciate any feedback possible.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 5 to 6 foot tall black humanoid that could run and fly.

content.detailedDescription: I was working inside the house, when my girlfriend called me outside, exclaiming "hurry!". i rushed out, and saw an orange flickering light, about the size of a dime at arms length. when i first saw it, my stomach dropped. it seemed highly out of place, as i could see airplanes in the distance (the airport is about 5 miles away). the planes flew in a typical manner, while the object floated for about 30 seconds, heading south (against the wind). it would stop for a minute or so, and then move in the same direction. total duration of the sighting lasted about 3 minutes. i figured it was a lantern of some sort, as it was flickering like a candle. both my girlfriend and i feel confused as to what it was. i ran inside the house to grab the camera, and took a photo. the object seemed still before it simply "turned off". the light just went out completely. about a minute after it went away, two planes flew in the direction of where the object had been previously, and started circling in the area.
content.summary: Almost like a lantern of sorts.

content.detailedDescription: Picked up my son being dropped off at a nearby subdivision (the preserve) then we were at the stop sign at our street, when my son notice the lights.  i then looked up and saw them myself.  instead of turning onto our street, we went straight thru the stop sign and around our subdivision and by the post office, the area was at a higher elevation so we could seen the enire surrounding location.  the lights were gone.  we then headed to the local gas station while looking up into the sky.  my son wanted a drink, so we stopped into the gas station.  at the counter was one of his friends from school, who then said to my son, i just saw a ufo, he was coming into town from nelson, ga which is opposite from where were.  when we first saw the lights, they looked like they were traveling the speed of a small airplane, they couldn't have disappeared that fast.
content.summary: Three lights traveling north south of ball ground.

content.detailedDescription: I was flying home from jfk-mia on delta airlines, the night of december 31st, 2008,i was seated on seat 31e(window seat on md-88 jet)we were flying somewhere between south carolina and state of florida, when all a sudden i had this urge to look outside my window and, i saw this black rectangle slowly pass over our jet,it seemed as if it was floating(it was clear sky with a couple of clouds and a half moon)this object had no wings potruding from its sides,it was so black and from my angle of view which was looking at it from underneath it, appeared to be long and tall.It seemed to be floating maybe at about 500ft above us. it only had three lights at the front you could see it had white light that seemed as wide as this object this light did not seem to have any reflection on any of the surrounding clouds like regular jet lights do then,there was a red light under the object at a mid point between the front and back of it, the light was strobing very slow,also it was such a rich red color that you couldn't see where light bulb was, like on commercial jets( i fly for a living and we are train to observe a lot of things,)this light did not reflected on its surroundings either,like it was been absorbed by the very blackness of this object.The third light covered the whole back of this craft it was as wide and tall as the object it self,very rich red in color, no reflection, no flashing, just a beautiful red color against this black object i lost sight of it after what seemed to be a very long time and then the lights went off all of a sudden . this craft seemed to be floating in a west-northwest direction moving very slow, our jet was flying at about 30,000ft altitude,and this object was at about another 500-1000ft altitude above us,also the cabin lights inside our jet were turned off to allow the passangers to sleep after the services were completed by the working flight crew,which,made it easier to see outside the windows as there would be no glare from lights inside the jet's cabin.I am very sure of what i've seen. i told my family about it when i arrived in miami but, they thought i was joking.I wonder if anybody else saw this object on december 31st, 2008 at around the same time ?
content.summary: Slow floating rectangle.

content.detailedDescription: It looks like a bright bright star, and moves and pulsates..I have seen this for many years about this time of year, but not every year..There are no other stars out tonight..It appears close so i opened the door to make sure it wasn't a plane..No sound...My mother saw it first, but she also keeps an eye out for lights...I would say we have seen these off and on for almost 13 years now..I am just wondering if anyone else has seen anything in new hampshire tonight..It doesn't upset us or anything..Like i said we have seen these off and on for a while..After seeing it the first time we started looking for it..It's now 620est and it's still there, but not as bright, it appears to have moved off...
content.summary: Bright moving star.

content.detailedDescription: While walkling up to get my brother up for work i looked up at the mountain range behind his house and seen five cigar shape ufo - the one in the center was the largest one the two on each side of it were a little smaller and the two on the side of those were a little smaller then those - while looking at them and knocking on my brother door i could see thru the door and see him getting out of bed and making his way to the door a - while watching these objects they faded in and out twice - the second time it faded back in it was extremely bright almost to bright to look at - they were standing upright horizontal - the size was huge - the one in the center was so tall it took away the natural arc of the sky - color was bright white with no sharp edges - i hope that makes sense - its the only way i can describe how big they were - well anyway thats my story -
content.summary: Five cigar shape ufos.

content.detailedDescription: We got a call from my daughters boyfriend who was out on his apt balcony smoking with friend  few miles away and saw bright lit up object with pulsating green-red and blue lights, the helicopters would go towards it with a  spotlight and would turn back not getting to close and approach fron the other side- then there was about 4 choppers taking turns- with big spotlights, when they would turn around from it, we would see the spotlights, it continued for an hour or so then we went inside and came back out and it had moved up higher in the sky, we were looking at it with a rifle telecope its lights were brilliant and bright and could not really make out a shape cause of the brightness - but looked like a prism. last we saw it was higher and you could still see the lights but smaller--the choppers stopped - i think it was at a higher altitude they could not reach it.  last time this year we saw something as well - but this time it was all of us; me, my husband and three kiddos plus the other people on that apt balcony.  it was somewhere over 249 and the sam houston tollway or 290 area- far nw houston.
content.summary: Again we see a ufo last year at this time we saw something -- we reported to you- craft standing still- helcopters surrounding it,

content.detailedDescription:
June 12th of 2008 i saw a v-shaped object in chicago at belmont ave.
i believe the object i saw ay january 5, 2009 is the same or similar object i saw in 2008.  i was going to work at 4:50 a.M. and was east bound on i-90.  i had just past the cumberland exit when i looked up and saw something partially visible in the morning sky.  there was a lot of clouds, but through an open patch i could see three traffic color green lights and one white light just hanging there.  at first i just stared then i realized it wasn't moving.  i would estimate the height at about 750 feet.  i stared at it and wondered if i should pull off and snap a picture with my camera phone, but decided it was too dark and probably would not come out well.  i continued to watch it and noticed there were divisions between the lights, something i believed was there in 2008.  i could see what looked like light grey metal separating the lights, and a design that reminded me of mother of pearl coloring, shaped like frothy waves going up the metal divisions.  they appeared to me to be three dimensional.  i looked to the east and could see several planes flashing in the distance coming toward o'hare airport.  i once again realized there was no flashing of these lights, they were not moving in any way, just hanging behind the clouds.  i watched until i was too far east to see them any longer.  this took place in cook county.
content.summary: Possible recurrence of sighting from june 2008.

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside on my morning break. i walked out to the lagoon to stand in the sun. the sky was clear blue and the air crisp. visibility was very good.

when i first noticed the object i thought it might be a small cloud. but the more i observed it didn't appear to be. it slowly moved southbound along the hwy 101 corridor.

as it moved further away it started to disappear. when it totally vanished it immediately reappeared at a lower elevation and further away. when i finally lost sight of it, i estimate it traveled from redwood city to mountain view.
content.summary: White cigar shaped over sf bay area peninsula...

content.detailedDescription: I waited until i could confirm that the international space station was not possibly seen this morning (jan.7th 2009) at 6:23am. what i saw was very comparable to the 2 times that i intentionally planned and viewed the station over the last two years. the object was within the edge or just above the atmosphere and it glowed appx. 5 times more brightly than the space station making it very, very large in mass. it travelled north to south at tens of thousands of miles per hour as any object would at such altitude. it was easy for me to tell that it was within or just outside the atmosphere by the familiar glowing, hazy yellow/amber glow as apposed to a typical light emission in the troposphere. it moved in a line, steady and in pace with an object that would reside or travel many miles above the earth's surface. this craft was huge! i say craft because of it's intentional pace and direction unlike a meteor. i walked out to my car, eyes to the skies as usual���and there it was. i live on the south side of our town. the predawn starlight was brilliant and aside from a lot of atmosphere turbulence (twinkling stars are a good way to tell), it was clear to slightly hazy. the object was visible for about 30+ seconds. i ran and grabbed my binoculars and got a good glimpse of its circular shape. spherical or disk, i couldn���t tell for sure, circular for certain. i tried to work our expensive, zoom able camera and i could not take the shot. the camera turned on but it wouldn���t snap the photo. the object faded from sight drastically. i was about 20 degrees from being directly below it and when it came to a certain spot in the sky, it seemed to continue on horizontally as apposed to continuing on with the earth's curvature. i need to learn how to set it quickly for night shooting���it was operator error; i don't believe it was due to any other "interference". this is not my first report. i have reported to the national ufo reporting agency once before and have reported a sighting to my local news paper which lead to an investigation. i have seen many unexplainable things in this area over the course of 20 years here. i keep my eyes to the skies and will make a larger effort to report them...And record them.
content.summary: Circular/disk shaped object directly observed in the upper atmoshere, very large, very fast.

content.detailedDescription: I checked out in the front of my house, to make sure everything is ok.I noticed above the trees a very bright white light. i watched it off and on for one hr. my son said it was a star. no it wasnts. as i watched it i noticed that it would fade in and out. i knew then it wasn't a planet or star. it also would sue a blue light around it it would wobble .I live approx. 12 miles from atlanta. there were no planes in the area.I have been seeing this off and on since christmas.
content.summary: Out front window, i saw a very brightr light, no planet, no star, i watched it for an hour. it blinked in and out.

content.detailedDescription: 2009-01-08  il  white object primarily seen as spherical but did briefly appear to be boomerang shaped sighted in central illinois
content.summary: 09-01-08  il  white object  - is this debunker jiberiss, designed to waste our time?

content.detailedDescription:
I know this was a l-o-n-g time ago, but...
when i was a kid (13ish) i saw an iridescent flashing/pulsating green disc shaped object in the summer sky between philadelphia (port richmond area) and the north camden/pennsauken area of nj. the object seemed to move effortlessly and at odd angles (up/down, back/forth, hover, etc). after only a few minutes minutes, it traveled north (very quickly) and out of sight. from my vantage point, looking eastward from my second floor bedroom window, it seemed to be roughly following the delaware river. several days later i heard my sister's friend (a neighbor [16ish] from across the street) telling the story of her sighting to her friends. they seemed skeptical. but i not only corroborated her story, i also added details about it's movement, location, the time of day, etc. we determined that we must have seen the same thing on the same evening.

i know this is not a 'hot' sighting but i thought i'd add my information just in case others reported something similar.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Erratic, quick moving, pulsating, green disc appeared near phila one summer in the early to mid 70s.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i observed same star like object over jobes peak in carson valley as previous report from the man in reno.  this object i have seen several times stationary in the sky.  i have not seen it move in any odd way and it never disapeared while i was looking at it.  tonight it looked even bigger in the sky. almost like it is in our orbit.  this bright star turns yellow and sometimes blue as it blinks at times.  i have dismissed it as maybe the international space station or possibly a satelite.  if anyone else is in the area, you can try looking at the west sky around 7pm and see for yourself.  i am sure it will be there again.  if you have a telescope, maybe you can tell us what it is.  went back outside to observe it again at 9:30 pm but it had already set behind the sierra nevada mountains.
content.summary: Bright star like object, bigger than normal star.

content.detailedDescription: At roughly 7:00pm i was traveling westbound on i-74w in central illinois.  near brimfield i spotted a spherical white object the size of a golf ball in the southern sky moving in a northwesterly direction.  initially i assumed it was star, but upon further examination it was not that high in the sky.  i kept driving and the more i watched the object it seemed strange.  it was one solid light with no other lights around it.  i called my father to tell him what i was looking at because by this time i had been watching it for 10 minutes.  he started to ask me how big, how high the object was.  it was hard to say and then an obvious commercial airplane flew behind and above the object.  being a commercial airliner i assume that it might have been flying at 30,000 ft and was maybe 30-50 miles away, the object i would guess at an altitude of 5,000 feet and 5-10 miles away.  a size comparison if the airplane was anywhere from 80-220ft in length the object had to have been i guess at 50-100ft.  the object was still traveling in a northwest direction in the southern sky from my perspective, it seemed to be a moving roughly the same pace as me for 25 miles.  as i continued to watch and drive the object for several minutes appeared to be in the shape of a boomerang, i assume this was because of the angle i was viewing it from.  i was driving to burlington, ia so i exited onto 34west in galesburg, il.  for 25-30 minutes i had been watching this strange object and i felt compelled to call 911 not out of fear, but for the desire that if this was ���something��� i wouldn���t have been the only one to see it.  i pulled over on the highway and did call galesburg���s 911 and they did say they would send a car to check it out.  i continued to drive and was in between galesburg and monmouth, il heading west.  i pulled over again because the object was directly in front of me and was much closer than it had been before.  i got out of my car to see if i could hear any noise and it was silent.  i did also at that time call my father again and had him get a phone number for mufon from their website, i briefly talked with someone and told them what i was seeing.  the object at this time appeared it was maybe 3-5 miles away and maybe 2000-4000ft in altitude.  i got in my car and continued trying to get a closer view, but the object then increased its distance from me.  i arrived in monmouth and stopped at a gas station to view the object so i could have a stationary point of reference.   the object appeared further away and was either stationary or traveling away from me.  i started to question what i was seeing wondering if my eyes are playing tricks on me is it just star, so i went into the gas station to buy some cigarettes.  when i came out the object was still in the same place, i started to question myself again, am i just looking at venus or some other star.  i got back onto the highway again and the object appeared to come closer again briefly.   within seconds the object gained greatly in altitude and distance disappeared into the sky heading northwest and into orbit.  this sighting lasted overall 70-85 minutes. while i was on the highway of course there was traffic and maybe some other people saw it also, i hoped that driving 50mph when the speed limit was 65mph some people might notice the object also.  this was a very crazy sighting of something i can���t explain.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: White object primarily seen as spherical but did briefly appear to be boomerang shaped sighted in central illinois.

content.detailedDescription: I was at recess when my teacher said look up theres a ufo, i remember just like it was yesterday there was a bright oblong to circle object in the sky, it was super bright  i know this because it was a sunny day this object moved through the sky like nothing i ever seen even now i have never seen anything that even closely resembles what we sall that day. the object was on one side of the sky then the other and then back, lightning speed in order for it to move that far that quick it had to be out of this world. and then it was gone.........Been telling this story for years and i still say it was a ufo....I would like to get a hold of my 1st grade teacher to see if he remembers anything about that day...I know i never forgot!I could take you to the exact spot we were standing that day.Still gives me chills
content.shape: Cigar,  Circle,  Cylinder,  Disc,  Oval,  Sphere,  Teardrop
content.summary: I was in the first grade my teacher pointed it out.

content.detailedDescription: Now that i have a computer i can tell my story! in 1999 i lived in windsor maine east of augusta maine. i went out my back door to smoke a cig. the day was cloudless blue sky. jets from europe fly over at that time of day, so i noticed its con trail. im a trained weather observer when i was in the navy so i know altiudes and types of jets. as i observer jet at 11 oclock high i noticed a flach out of the corner of my eye at 1 oclock. i turned to look and to my amazement this huge disc was just sitting up there. i know that it was above jet because its con trail went under disc. the disc was so large you could put 6 jet in its disc. hard to say how high above jet disc was. on size of disc on the order of i estimate 1500ft in diameter. jet flew under and went on its way. i watch dics shoot straight up counting one thousand one one thousand two one thousand three and it disapeared into space. as i was counting the disc was getting smaller and smaller so i know it went stright up and out of sight. what i saw was real, the sun was glaring a reflection off of this disc. i assume the pilots were quite upset to see this disc, they could not miss seeing disc. i now live in hobe sound, fl. and im 60 years of age my cell phone number is still out of maine as you have it on the report. this still raises the hair on the back of my neck. now this jet was commerial airliner 4 engine so you guess size of disc?  ron t.
content.summary: Giant disc 1000+ feet around above 39000ft above jet coming in from europe.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my back yard on my deck with my wife when we both saw an orange circle or ball or something. we saw it fly across the sky at a gradual speed, when it got near the end of my vision it sped up forward then came back across the sky  from where it started from then forward across again and then dissappeard. this happened all in about 1 -2 minutes. i didn't say anything to my wife, but she is the one who immediately asked me if i saw the same thing and i did. it looked like an orange star, it was about th same size. but it obviously wasn't because flying stars don't go back and forth.
content.summary: The shape flew across the sky. it was orange.

content.detailedDescription: Thursday january 8 2009 my husband and i were visiting our daughter in florence ms. when my husband spotted a bright light in the sky. he called for us to come see the unusual light hovering somewhere between the stars and tree line. i dismissed it as a bright star or planet. this sighting was at about 7 p.M.. later on our way home my husband still staring into the sky spotted a bright light again. this appeared to be  three bright white looking lights moving toward us. this time i dismissed the sighting as an airplane or jet, but as the lights moved closer i became aware that this was nothing i had ever seen before. three bright lights in each corner of a large triangled shape object illuminated white , three smaller white lights positioned between the largers lights were also easily viewed, and in the center appeared to be many even smaller red twinkling lights. my husband stopped the car in amazement yelling the entire time, oh my god, oh my god. my husband stepped out of the car at this time pointing and still yelling. at this time the object that appeared to be directed from one point now started moving in a diferent direction, toward us. gliding,with no sound heard.  again nothing i had ever seen before. at this time i started yelling but not in amazement as my husband, but in fear. afraid of something i would not ever be able to explain.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Triangler shaped object with three bright white lights in each point , 3 smaller white lights between.

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of december 29, 2008 i was at my brothers apartment for the weekend along with my girlfriend. i had the first sighting about 8:00pm when i thought a police helicopter was coming over someone���s house we were parked in front of, my girlfriend was inside , my feet were propped up on the dash of the truck, and i saw the lights coming over the house. i got out the truck to get a better look, there was no noise from this light. i noticed there were two of them. suddenly they zoomed close as if going 1,200 mph and froze within several hundred feet ahead, and about one hundred feet above me. they had spot lights, windows, and bright. we got anxious, and left after my girlfriend saw them. later on that night at my brothers i began looking out the window, and found those glowing colorful lights as in the account recently posted on this site. we watched lights all night long. there were sparkles in the distance, there were red amber contrails passing right ahead of the house as if a huge glowing comet flew by, only inside the head it was shaped like a disk, but nothing there as if invisible, then was gone in a blink. we got in the car, and went to the river where it was very dark, away from the city lights. we watched many bright lights move, they look almost like stars. one especially we watched bob up and down, and all around behind the trees. we decided to leave, and the light followed us home. at this point we began flashing our car lights at the object and it responded with bright colors. after about 6:00am we saw a saucer object pass directly over our car, it had no lights on and disappeared in the distance, it made no noise. another object saucer shaped passed over the house at about 85 feet up in the sky, we hung out the dormer window and watched delta shaped lights blink from the back to front in repetition, it made no sound, and sped away very fast. there were lights everywhere that night, things that us three will never be able to fully understand, or explain. the last sighting was at about 7:30am, we were all upstairs, my brother peeking out of the dormer window looking for anything else. the sun was up by this time. he looked left ( due north) and said, ���what the hell is that?���. i looked out and saw a saucer wobbling, and hovering above the trees. we told my girlfriend to get up and look, and when she hung her head out, and saw it she closed her eyes and looked straight ahead stating that she didn���t want to see anymore, she had seen enough, she was scared, and at disbelief. me, and my brother continued to watch it though. it was silver, about 80 feet across, had two lights blinking on the top, orange, and red. the saucer wobbled as it moved, the outer part spinning as the center part was stationary. it moved up and down over the trees, and didn���t make a noise, it was approximately 300 yards away. the whole time it moved we heard shotguns going off, people were shooting at it, as hunting season is still in right now in statesboro. i estimate we heard gunshots non-stop for four whole minutes, they were either scared, or upset people, it sounded like a war zone. it finally vanished bobbing up, and down over the trees, at very low altitude, we don���t know where it went from there. the gunshots stopped and no one saw it again after it hit a open area (?), dipped down, and shot up at a high rate of speed is my guess, it was dead quiet after all this passed. we saw some triangle shaped objects the next night and some other strange lights, but nothing like monday night, tuesday morning. i���ve always believed in ufo���s and the fact we are not alone, but my girlfriend didn���t. she believes now, and doesn���t look at me crazy anymore. i���ll never forget that night. we keep our eyes to the stars now, they might not really be stars. i can���t fully explain the sights, and emotions we all felt, to really know, to see, the questions left in your head, feeling like you���re crazy. we weren���t drinking or high. you almost want to suppress it in your mind, it���s too much all at once.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Chevron,  Circle,  Disc,  Sphere,  Square,  Rectagular,  Star-like,  Triangle
content.summary: Lights/moving lights/saucer/people shooting at saucer with shotguns/no joke.

content.detailedDescription: At 7:30 pm husband went outside to get something out of a vehicle and saw an extremely bright light far below the stars in the western sky above the treeline.  he called me and our 3 kids out to see (the show kath and kim had just started)as it was zigzagging and moving.  at first we thought it was a really big, extremely bright star really low in the sky.  the moon was in the opposite direction to our backs from the object, and was towards the new johnsonville area. as it is cold outside, we eventually came in to look out our upstairs window.  it would occasionally move towards us, and then away, and at one point separated into 3 bright white lights, and then went back to one and started having rotating red lights on it.  everyone watching would complain of their vision messing up while watching this, as it would go blurry and the surroundings would disappear it seemed, so we would have to look away to refocus.  this event lasted right at 1 hour, and at the last 3 minutes moved out of range of seeing through the upstairs window where it could only be seen from the front yard outside, then it disappeared behind the treeline very rapidly and was gone.  seeing things in the sky here has about become a common occurrence so we were not surprised at what we saw, or that there was something unusual in the sky here.  we have saw the same thing on more than this occasion, along with other types before.  there were at most times 3 witnesses to the event, and 5 saw it total in it's one hour time.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Extremely bright zigzagging light with rotating red lights.

content.detailedDescription: Saw two pairs of reddish orange lights in night sky   south east  of my house   moving south west ,as i was locking up my shed on that cold night very high in the sky id say 5-10k feet in the sky   static in color not blinking or pulsing was amazed &interested watched carefully for 10mins make sure was not a satellite or plane then went inside cause it was freezing out and told my wife who laughed at me,  and that was that till i saw,  a video on youtube of the same thing i saw http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=2n9oa62lem0&feature=channel_page
content.summary: Saw two pairs of red/orange lights in night sky.
